net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_searchGrantedModifiers
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Searches the data.modifier object for all modifiers granted by classes, backgrounds, feats, conditions, race, and equipped items.
arg(0) = { "object": "toon", "property": "fixedValue", "subType": "ability-checks", "type": "expertise" }
Within the JSON, the "object" parameter is required. It must be a full character JSON.
"property" is a reserved parameter that indicates the values to return. If "property" is not provided, the full entity is returned for each match.
All other key-value pairs are used as search terms.
